title: CNBC Daily Open: January's inflation reading was hotter than expected. Markets felt the heat
description: Markets fell as the personal consumption expenditures price index, the Federal Reserve’s preferred inflation measure, rose more than expected in January.

title: I asked ChatGPT to help me plan a vacation. Here’s what happened next
description: Artificial intelligence chatbots say they can help travelers research destinations and plan itineraries. CNBC Travel put ChatGPT to the test.

title: Chinese smartphone giant Xiaomi takes aim at Samsung and Apple with latest $1,000 device
description: Xiaomi launched the Xiaomi 13 and Xiaomi 13 Pro in international markets at Mobile World Congress.

title: Big city restaurants and bars are missing office workers' spending on Mondays and Fridays
description: The three-day in-person work week has forced restaurants and bars to get creative about pulling in customers on Mondays and Fridays.

title: Portugal, Spain and 8 other countries where a bottle of wine costs less than $7
description: The average price for a bottle of wine in Portugal is nearly two times less expensive than in the U.S., according to Compare My Jet's latest survey.

title: Barbara Corcoran says she made $1 million in a day selling apartments nobody wanted: I 'created a buying frenzy’
description: The lesson from entrepreneur and investor Barbara Corcoran's lucrative day: The illusion of exclusivity and demand can be powerful, especially in sales.

title: Instagram popularized the perfect home. Virtual design services make affording it possible
description: Hiring a top interior designer is a luxury few consumers can afford, but there’s a growing number of virtual services available for less.
